note: For comparisons across time and between countries, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
title: Age-standardized suicide rates: comparison of sources
subtitle: The death rate by suicide per 100,000 individuals in each age group. This is compared between the WHO Mortality Database (reported data submitted from each country), IHME GBD (modeled estimates), and WHO Global Health Estimates (reported data with adjustment for underreporting; or GBD estimates in countries lacking functioning [vital registries](#dod:crvs)).

relatedQuestions.text: Why do suicide rates vary between data sources?
